ModMetaData.name: [Obsolete] Mercenaries For Me
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi
ModMetaData.description: Hire and rent mercenaries. Fully customizable. NOTICE : Most of the features of this mod are now implemented in other mods and due to a lack of time and motivation, there will be no more updates or support for this mod. Thank you for your understanding. Version 1.5.27
